messages.subject: Reservation Deadline EXTENDED-2nd Annual UWWG (Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering)!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Great news............. The Final Deadline for making reservations for the 2nd Annual Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering has been  EXTENDED!!!     The
messages.messageBody:
Great news.............

The Final Deadline for making reservations for the 2nd Annual Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering has been  EXTENDED!!!  
 


The Kalahari Resort will continue taking reservations at our SUPER discounted group rate until there are no more available rooms!





Plus, there are NO Registration or Conference Fees!  Our super discounted room rates average to only $21.50 / person for a full kitchen, multi-room suite - and that includes your waterpasses and particiaption in all our UWWG Events!  What a tremendous deal!!!

 
So, those of you who received some extra holiday cash, you still have time to make your reservations!  
 
Join us for a week of awesome fun and support among hundreds of other unschooly / life learning homeschooling families from around the country, at Ohio's Kalahari Resort - the largest Indoor Waterpark in the USA!  http://www.kalahariresorts.com/oh/waterparks/


For further details on all our awesome Speakers, Funshops & Events and information on how to register, please join our UWWG yahoo group at: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWWG/

Happy Holidays and hope to see you at the 2nd Annual Unschoolers' Winter Waterpark Gathering, February 2-6, 2009!

Carol Reinhard
UWWG Coordinator

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
